comments:

I don't see any Mylar classes in the stack trace. Is this reproducible?
Yes it is reproducible. Everytime i am activating a task this error ocours. Do you need further information?
Does this happen after workbench restart?  What version of Eclipse are you using? Are there any other steps to reproduce other than simply activating a task?

I'm using Eclipse version 3.2.1 build id M20060921-0945.
At the Moment, after a few workbench restarts, the error did not occur any longer...
Usually i'm using the hibernation mode (my laptop has an uptime of 30 days) and do not close any application...
Have you been able to reproduce this error outside of a Mylar view? If we could establish a more general failure case perhaps this may be a bug for platform.
Please re-open if more data becomes available.
